title: *help* issue wth my screen's brightness *help*
body:
Yo, this issue doesn't happen in League only, but it drives me crazy, anyone can help ? 

Basically, when I display a white image on my screen, it's very bright, when I display a black image, it's very dark. How the hell can I stop this? 
IDK if it may help but I have an Asus computer running Windows 10.

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be software-controlled dynamic contrast or something similar that changes the brightness depending on content on the screen. I recommend reaching out to [Asus Support](https://www.asus.com/us/support/) about this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
